overview: Robert (not his real name), is a gay Zimbabwean man who fled to South Africa in the hopes of making this his home. What he found instead was abuse at the hands of other gay men, homophobia from Department of Home Affairs officials as well as the difficulties of navigating the Covid-19 pandemic as a sex worker living in a foreign country.  In this short film, Robert speaks with candour about fleeing his homeland, his life in South Africa and his hopes for the future.
title: No Gay Men in Zimbabwe
